item.source: Run server but not monsters to kill

item.title: Run server but not monsters to kill
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:3, topic:254608”]Moh, sorry fro correcting you but it should be placed in this format:

spawn = 1596	1926	5004	0	0	0	0	0	1	KYLE

Yeah place this in your autospawn.cfg, in this format, just change the 1596, 1926, 5004, and KYLE, to yours, they mean:

1596 : This is the ID of your NPC
1926 : The X Coordinate of your NPC
5004 : The Y Coordinate of your NPC
KYLE : The name of your NPC

Leave the zero’s, and ones alone for now, until you learn this a little better.[/quote]

Just to help out… Most servers have a ::mypos command that tells you the x and y coordinates.

Read full topic
item.source: Run server but not monsters to kill

item.title: Run server but not monsters to kill
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Moh, sorry fro correcting you but it should be placed in this format:

spawn = 1596	1926	5004	0	0	0	0	0	1	KYLE

Yeah place this in your autospawn.cfg, in this format, just change the 1596, 1926, 5004, and KYLE, to yours, they mean:

1596 : This is the ID of your NPC
1926 : The X Coordinate of your NPC
5004 : The Y Coordinate of your NPC
KYLE : The name of your NPC

Leave the zero’s, and ones alone for now, until you learn this a little better.
